channel.title: Website of Brendon Votteler
channel.description: Recent content on Website of Brendon Votteler

item.title: A Note on This Space
item.description: This space will hold future projects. And I might share a few past projects, too.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to my new website. And blog, I suppose. I’m working hard behind the scenes to put together more details about some of the system integrations I have completed previously.

item.title: About
item.description: I’ve spent over 20 years of my career creating, designing, and building software.

item.title: Contact
item.description: The best way to start a conversation with me is by email.

item.title: My Candidate Description
item.description: If you are reading this, chances are that you are a recruiter and I have sent you a link as part of an initial exchange.
